Sentencas: Integrating thermodynamic cycles with SOFCs is an effective technology to make full use of energy, but the difficulty lies in selecting the optimum thermodynamic cycles and integration scheme.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of a solid oxide fuel cell-based integrated system to select the optimal closed thermodynamic cycle and heat coupling scheme simultaneously

Sentencas: The performance of a thermodynamic cycle is directly determined by the working fluid and operating parameters, and the heat exchange network (HEN) synthesis scheme directly affects the heat coupling degree and the economic performance.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of a solid oxide fuel cell-based integrated system to select the optimal closed thermodynamic cycle and heat coupling scheme simultaneously

Sentencas: Therefore, a multi-objective optimization model is proposed in this paper, where the working fluid and operating parameters of the closed cycle, as well as the HEN synthesis scheme are selected as decision variables, while the total exergy destruction (TED) and the total annual cost (TAC) are adopted as the objectives.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of a solid oxide fuel cell-based integrated system to select the optimal closed thermodynamic cycle and heat coupling scheme simultaneously

Sentencas: To solve this complex problem, a solving strategy based on NSGA-II with two levels is proposed to obtain the Pareto Frontier of TED and TAC.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of a solid oxide fuel cell-based integrated system to select the optimal closed thermodynamic cycle and heat coupling scheme simultaneously

Sentencas: Finally, a case is solved and three Pareto optimality are analyzed and compared.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of a solid oxide fuel cell-based integrated system to select the optimal closed thermodynamic cycle and heat coupling scheme simultaneously
